name: Countries Individual Project
description: Fullstack web application that relates the countries of the world and the activities that can be done in them. It allows the users to create any activity and relate it to as many countries as they want. It also shows relevant information about all the countries of the world

frontEnd.graphicConcept: Based on the early stages of aviation and the birth of aerial travel. It includes vintage details and images that transport the users to the first decade of the twentieth century. The fonts used in the project are the same that were used in printed documents of that time

wiews.name: Landing Page
wiews.description: Welcoming page that allows entrance to the application and provides links to my social media pages

wiews.name: Home Page
wiews.description: This page contains the main functionality of the app. It displays all the countries' cards organized in pages of 10 countries. It also has a panel that allows the information to be organized and filtered according to different parameters.

wiews.name: Detail Page
wiews.description: Shows further information about the selected country.

wiews.name: Activities Page
wiews.description: Displays all the activities that are stored in the data base, including the countries in which they are available. It includes a form that allows the user to create new activities

backEnd.description: CRUD API that filters and serves information for the frontEnd
